title: Trading my T206/T205 for your VIP National Promos
author: peterose4hof

posts.post_title: Trading my T206/T205 for your VIP National Promos
posts.post_content:
Here is a great opportunity to unload your unwanted Promo cards and add to your prewar collections all at the same time.

I have the following T206 & T205 cards that I am willing to trade for the promo cards that come in the VIP goody bags at the 2012 National.

Please pm me if interested in working out a deal.

T206 Bescher (Sweet Cap 350-460)  --  T206 Paskert (Sweet Cap 350)
T205 Hoblitzell (Polar Bear)  --  T205 McLean (Polar Bear)
T205 Egan (Sweet Cap)  --  T205 Mitchell (Polar Bear)

[IMG]http://i1049.photobucket.com/albums/s393/peterose4hof/tcards.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i1049.photobucket.com/albums/s393/peterose4hof/tcards003.jpg[/IMG]
I am also willing to buy the VIP card packages outright if you don't see anything you want to trade for.  PM or email me.  [url]bubbalamb@cfl.rr.com[/url]
